data.system_settings: Kyocera Hydro Wave Android 5.1 and Sharp Crystal Aquos Android 4.4.2
data.actual_result: it's gone, and you can lose a bit of emojis if you have the recommendations pop up
data.expected_result: the emoji picker bottom bar shouldnt disappear
data.short_description: Emoji pickers bottom bar disappears [Small Screen Size Only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Rotate to landscape - open emoji picker - click a lot of emojis (if you can't repro here, use the next step) - hold down on the emoji picker back space until emoji suggestions pop up
